meanings.definition: A superficially attractive appearance or impression.
meanings.sent1: The magazine cover had a glossy gloss that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: She applied a shiny gloss to her lips before the party.
meanings.sent3: The salesman's smooth talk was just a gloss to hide the poor quality of the product.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a gloss, hiding the sadness underneath.
meanings.sent5: The new car's sleek design was a perfect gloss for its high price.

meanings.definition: An explanation or interpretation, especially of difficult or technical terms.
meanings.sent1: The gloss at the end of the book helped me understand the complex story better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's gloss on the scientific theory made it easier to grasp.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to give a gloss on the topic only confused the students more.
meanings.sent4: The gloss provided by the expert shed light on the obscure language used in the document.
meanings.sent5: The gloss in the dictionary clarified the meaning of the unfamiliar word.

meanings.definition: To provide a gloss or glosses on a text.
meanings.sent1: The professor would often gloss over the difficult parts of the lecture.
meanings.sent2: She decided to gloss the ancient manuscript to make it more accessible to modern readers.
meanings.sent3: He tried to gloss the errors in his report, but his boss noticed them anyway.
meanings.sent4: The editor had to gloss the text to make it suitable for the younger audience.
meanings.sent5: The translator had to gloss the poem to capture its beauty in another language.

meanings.definition: To give a bright, shiny appearance.
meanings.sent1: The sun would gloss the surface of the lake every morning.
meanings.sent2: She used a special polish to gloss the wooden table.
meanings.sent3: The raindrops on the leaves would gloss in the sunlight after the storm.
meanings.sent4: The jeweler carefully glossed the gemstones to make them sparkle.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes would gloss the painting with vibrant colors.
